item.description:
Come play tennis at Salem State College in Salem, MA!  They have 6 new courts! Find directions to the courts here: http://goo.gl/maps/1LzAC

 

Please RSVP 'YES' if you're interested.  If something comes up and you cannot make it, come back to the site to update your RSVP to 'NO'.  If you want to come earlier than the scheduled time, mention it in the comments below to see if others are interested.


If you've come to at least three of our events, please consider donating $5/year to cover the yearly cost of running the North of Boston Tennis meetup and to help keep the group running!  Members can pay Melissa online via Paypal at http://www.meetup.com/North-of-Boston-Tennis/dues/.  Thank you for your support!
item.name: Wed Tennis in Salem, MA
